surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely

sentences.english: She has wronged me, and I wish to do her justice.
sentences.chinese: 虽然她冤枉了我，可我还是希望对她做到仁至义尽。

sentences.english: But, I told her, that keeps me ten years woman enough. ?
sentences.chinese: 可是，我对她，那个养了我十年的女人仁至义尽了吗？

sentences.english: Chinese people have done everything possible.
sentences.chinese: 中国人，已经做到了仁至义尽。

definition: lit. to destroy the bridge after crossing the river (idiom)/fig. to abandon one's benefactor upon achieving one's goal
to bite the hand that feeds one (idiom)
to go to extremes/to leave no room for maneuver
to forget favors and violate justice (idiom); ingratitude to a friend/to kick a benefactor in the teeth
to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
to be even/to be quits/to be even-steven
deeply grateful
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
to have only oneself to blame (idiom)/to bring trouble through one's own actions
completely lacking any feeling or sense of justice (idiom); cold and ruthless
mutual affection/friendship
to fall out with sb and become hostile
to have an acrimonious falling-out/to shed all pretense of cordiality/to tear into each other
